title: The Monkees - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/11/22
itunes:title: The Monkees - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/11/22
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and songwriter Chip Douglas recount his music career in the 1960s pop band The Turtles, and how he became the producer for the Monkees and helped create some of their most famous songs including "Daydream Believer" and "Pleasant Valley Sunday."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
